Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.1: And the princes of the people dwelt at Jerusalem: but the rest of the people cast lots, to take one part in ten to dwell in Jerusalem the holy city, and nine parts in the other cities.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.2: And the people blessed all the men that willingly offered themselves to dwell in Jerusalem.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.3: These therefore are the chief men of the province, who dwelt in Jerusalem, and in the cities of Juda. And every one dwelt in his possession, in their cities: Israel, the priests, the Levites, the Nathinites, and the children of the servants of Solomon.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.4: And in Jerusalem there dwelt some of the children of Juda, and some of the children of Benjamin: of the children of Juda, Athaias the son of Aziam, the son of Zacharias, the son of Amarias, the son of Saphatias, the son of Malaleel: of the sons of Phares,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.5: Maasia the son of Baruch, the son of Cholhoza, the son of Hazia, the son of Adaia, the son of Joiarib, the son of Zacharias, the son of the Silonite:
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.6: All these the sons of Phares, who dwelt in Jerusalem, were four hundred sixty-eight valiant men.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.7: And these are the children of Benjamin: Sellum the son of Mosollam, the son of Joed, the son of Phadaia, the son of Colaia, the son of Masia, the son of Etheel, the son of Isaia.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.8: And after him Gebbai, Sellai, nine hundred twenty-eight.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.9: And Joel the son of Zechri their ruler, and Judas the son of Senua was second over the city.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.10: And of the priests Idaia the son of Joarib, Jachin,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.11: Saraia the son of Helcias, the son of Mosollam, the son of Sadoc, the son of Meraioth, the son of Achitob the prince of the house of God,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.12: And their brethren that do the works of the temple: eight hundred twenty-two. And Adaia the son of Jeroham, the son of Phelelia, the son of Amsi, the son of Zacharias, the son of Pheshur, the son of Melchias,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.13: And his brethren the chiefs of the fathers: two hundred forty-two. And Amassai the son of Azreel, the son of Ahazi, the son of Mosollamoth, the son of Emmer,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.14: And their brethren who were very mighty, a hundred twenty-eight: and their ruler Zabdiel son of the mighty.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.15: And of the Levites Semeia the son of Hasub, the son of Azaricam, the son of Hasabia, the son of Boni,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.16: And Sabathai and Jozabed, who were over all the outward business of the house of God, of the princes of the Levites,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.17: And Mathania the son of Micha, the son of Zebedei, the son of Asaph, was the principal man to praise, and to give glory in prayer, and Becbecia the second, one of his brethren, and Abda the son of Samua, the son of Galal, the son of Idithun.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.18: All the Levites in the holy city were two hundred eighty-four.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.19: And the porters, Accub, Telmon, and their brethren, who kept the doors: a hundred seventy-two.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.20: And the rest of Israel, the priests and the Levites were in all the cities of Juda, every man in his possession.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.21: And the Nathinites, that dwelt in Ophel, and Siaha, and Gaspha of the Nathinites.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.22: And the overseer of the Levites in Jerusalem, was Azzi the son of Bani, the son of Hasabia, the son of Mathania, the son of Micha. Of the sons of Asaph, were the singing men in the ministry of the house of God.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.23: For the king's commandment was concerning them, and an order among the singing men day by day.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.24: And Phathahia the son of Mesezebel of the children of Zara the son of Juda was at the hand of the king, in all matters concerning the people,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.25: And in the houses through all their countries. Of the children of Juda so dwelt at Cariath-Arbe, and in the villages thereof: and at Dibon, and in the villages thereof: and at Cabseel, and in the villages thereof.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.26: And at Jesue, and at Molada, and Bethphaleth,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.27: And at Hasersual, and at Bersabee, and in the villages thereof,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.28: And at Siceleg, and at Mochona, and in the villages thereof,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.29: And at Remmon, and at Saraa, and at Jerimuth,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.30: Zanoa, Odollam, and in their villages, at Lachis and its dependencies, and at Azeca and the villages thereof. And they dwelt from Bersabee unto the valley of Ennom.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.31: And the children of Benjamin, from Geba, at Mechmas, and at Hai, and at Bethel, and in the villages thereof,
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.35: And Ono the valley of craftsmen.
Nehemiah or 2 Esdras__11.36: And of the Levites were portions of Juda and Benjamin.
